miic.core.corr_mat_processing.corr_mat_time_select¶

corr_mat_time_select(corr_mat, starttime=None, endtime=None)[source]¶

Select time period from a correlation matrix.

Select correlation traces from a correlation matrix that fall into the time period starttime`<= selected times <= `endtime and return them in a correlation matrix.

Parameters:
  • corr_mat (dictionary) – correlation matrix dictionary as produced by recombine_corr_data
  • starttime (datetime.datetime object or time string) – beginning of the selected time period
  • endtime (datetime.datetime object or time string) – end of the selected time period
Return type:

dictionary
Returns:

corr_mat: correlation matrix dictionary restricted to the selected time period.
